onsens.name: Oyu (Big Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: The symbol of Nozawa Onsen and the most famous of the 13 public baths.

local_info.local_tips: The hottest and most popular. Try early morning for quieter experience.

onsens.name: Kawaharayu

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Located near the river, known for its therapeutic waters.

local_info.local_tips: Slightly cooler than Oyu, good for those who find Oyu too hot.

onsens.name: Kumanotearayu (Bear's Paw Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Named after a legend of a bear washing its injured paw here.

local_info.local_tips: One of the quieter baths, good for relaxation.

onsens.name: Akiha-no-yu

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Located near Akiha shrine, popular with locals.

local_info.local_tips: Popular with locals who come daily.

onsens.name: Juodo-no-yu

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: One of the larger public baths with good facilities.

local_info.local_tips: Spacious compared to other public baths.

onsens.name: Matsuba-no-yu

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Pine Needle Bath - located in quieter area of village.

local_info.local_tips: One of the quieter, more peaceful baths.

onsens.name: Naka-no-yu (Middle Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Centrally located bath, moderate temperature makes it popular.

local_info.local_tips: Good for those who find other baths too hot.

onsens.name: Shin-yu (New Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Despite the name, this is not new - renovated traditional bath.

onsens.name: Kami-no-yu (Upper Temple Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Located in upper part of village near temple area.

onsens.name: Shimo-no-yu (Lower Temple Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Located in lower part of village, pair to Kami-no-yu.

onsens.name: Yokochi-no-yu

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Known for unique architecture and peaceful atmosphere.

local_info.local_tips: Hidden gem, less known to tourists.

onsens.name: Taki-no-yu (Waterfall Bath)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Named after nearby waterfall, one of the most scenic locations.

onsens.name: Ogama (Cooking Onsen)

location.address: Nozawa Onsen Village, Shimotakai District, Nagano 389-2502

onsens.description: Not for bathing! Used by villagers to cook vegetables and eggs in the 90°C water.

local_info.local_tips: Great photo spot. Watch locals cooking vegetables. Do not touch water!
